text: I need to get the fields which is used in the contact form using API

<@U04B32JHTUZ> It might be quite specific to my use case, and maybe I'm just misunderstanding things. However, I do have a workflow that removes associations between tickets and emails sometimes to get around some bad data from an old integration I don't have any control over. I would like to also remove the association of the email/conversation from that company.
